snippet: A 58-year-old man who served nearly 30 years in prison on a murder conviction has been freed after DNA testing pointed to another man as the culprit.
abstract: Randolph Arledge, 58-year-old Texas man who served nearly 30 years in prison on a murder conviction, is freed after DNA testing points to another man as culprit.
lead_paragraph: A 58-year-old man who served nearly 30 years in prison on a murder conviction has been freed after DNA testing pointed to another man as the culprit.

headline.main: Texas: DNA Test Leads to Freedom After 30 Years
headline.print_headline: Texas: DNA Test Leads To Freedom After 30 Years
